# Heatmap of Maunga Whau

```{r}
# Data wrangling
volcano_tbl <- as_tibble(volcano)

colnames(volcano_tbl) <- 1:ncol(volcano) 
volcano_tbl$row <- 1:nrow(volcano_tbl)

volcano_long <- volcano_tbl %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -row,
    names_to = "x",
    values_to = "z"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    x = as.integer(x),
    y = row
  ) %>%
  select(x, y, z)
# Graphing

```
